Creating a Service CardÂ¶

The purpose of this page is to guide you on all the steps required to deploy a new service through CitizenOne.

To accomplish this, you will need the following:

  1. Create a Policy (if applicable)

  2. Create an Organization (if applicable)

  3. Create an Application (if applicable)

  4. Create a Service Card

  5. Create a Rule (if applicable)

  6. Create a Trust Provider (if applicable)

Please refer to the pages above to setup your service card.
